trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the <see langword="authorization" /> section contained in the <see langword="webParts" /> section of the configuration.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> class provides configuration support for personalization authorizations for Web Parts.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> classe fornece suporte à configuração de autorizações de personalização das Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to allow or deny access to Web Parts resources.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser usada para permitir ou negar acesso a recursos de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The following configuration-file example shows how to declaratively specify values for properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de arquivo de configuração a seguir mostra como especificar declarativamente valores para propriedades da <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization" /> class.
This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class is available from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância dessa classe é proveniente do <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of rules used for personalization authorization related to Web Parts.

An <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> object contains an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A> property, a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A> property, and a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> objeto contém um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A> propriedade, um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A> propriedade e um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: These properties can be set to allow or deny access to a Web Parts resource.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades podem ser definidas para permitir ou negar acesso a um recurso de Web Parts.
